From:

Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein 2018R01618 
Date: Wed, 14 Aug 2019 16:47:52 -4)000 
OK. Crazy 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:19 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Epstein 2018R01618 
Importance: High 
Is this good enough? 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 11:29 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Epstein 2018R01618 
Importance: High 
What we can do is have the Help Desk manually remove the standard VNS closing paragraphs from the letter for 
each of the registrants. We cannot remove the closing from the email notices (about five registrants have email 
addresses). If that is acceptable, let me know and I will follow up with the instructions on how to proceed. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 9:57 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Epstein 2018R01618 
M. is there a way to remove the closing paragraph of the VNS notification? 
VNS Project Manager I EOUSA I  Office of Legal Programs 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 7:55 AM 
Toil 
Subject: Epstein 2018R01618 
The SDNY USA Geoffrey Berman wants a notice to go out with two paragraphs only. The introduction and the added 
text. He was very specific on what he wants. 
I called= at VNS help desk and he could not tell me how to manipulate the notification so that it only has two 
paragraphs the introduction and other. 
EFTA00017765

Can you- and I figure out how to do this. The 
notice is timely. 
Victim Witness Coordinator 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel. 
EFTA00017766
